title: Researcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose two players to Tag, saving their name and the current night (ex: you save "John Giles - Night 3" after tagging someone).
- At night, instead you may choose to Analyze a Tag. Select two of these things to learn:
 - Who visited them that night
 - Who they visited that night
 - If they visited, or were visited by, at least one evil player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You consume Tags after Analyzing them.
- __*Made for the Curated role list*__
